Name: Pure Heart
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Special Attack and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Togepi, Togetic, and Togekiss.  Swap a Togepi Dew and a Togepi Card for a Pure Heart at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
